validation.maxLength: {{field}} must not be longer than {{count}} characters

auth.signInDescription: Enter your email and password below to log into your account
auth.termsAgreement: By clicking login, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}

otp.title: Verification Code
otp.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code sent to {{email}}

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Create your account to get started
register.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

errors.accountLocked: Account has been locked. Please contact administrator
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.termsRequired: You must agree to the terms and conditions
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile.usernameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
profile.emailDescription: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings.
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
profile.bioDescription: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.
profile.urlsDescription: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.
account.name: Name
account.nameDescription: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
account.dateOfBirthDescription: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.languageDescription: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.themeDescription: Select the theme for the dashboard.
appearance.fontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the dashboard.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.communicationEmailsDescription: Receive emails about your account activity.
notifications.marketingEmailsDescription: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
notifications.socialEmailsDescription: Receive emails for friend requests, follows, and more.
notifications.securityEmailsDescription: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
notifications.mobileSettings: Use different settings for my mobile devices

mobileSettingsDescription.prefix: You can manage your mobile notifications in the

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.
display.sidebarDescription: Select the items you want to display in the sidebar.
display.avatarDisplayDescription: Choose which avatar to display in the interface.
display.selectAtLeastOne: You have to select at least one item.

401.title: 401 - Unauthorized
401.heading: Authentication Required
401.description: You need to sign in to access this page. Please provide valid credentials to continue.

403.title: 403 - Forbidden
403.heading: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access this resource. If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator.

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.heading: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. The link might be broken or the page may have been moved.

500.title: 500 - Internal Server Error
500.heading: Server Error
500.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue.

503.title: 503 - Service Unavailable
503.heading: Service Temporarily Unavailable
503.description: The service is temporarily down for maintenance. Please check back in a few minutes.

general.title: Oops! Something went wrong
general.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
